General.Name: Hunan TV & Broadcast Intermediary Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan TV & Broadcast Intermediary Co., Ltd. engages in the advertising business in the People's Republic of China. It offers advertising agencies, rail self-media advertising, online games, etc.; and engages in the investment and cultural tourism business. Hunan TV & Broadcast Intermediary Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Hunan Golden Eagle Film & Television Cul, Changsha, China, 410003
